sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP BTP and Data to Value Strategy
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP BTP and Data-2-Value Strategy
sessionsByTrack.tracktitle: SAP BTP General and Cross Topics

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Using SAP Build Process Automation Pre-packaged Content to Accelerate Application Development
sessionsByTrack.description: With the increasing scarcity of technical developers, there is a growing need of pre-packaged content which helps organizations to accelerate their solution development and integration to common business problems. In this session, you will learn about different pre-packaged content from SAP Build Process Automation and how can you leverage them to speed up your application development and integration.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Reusable AI Assets. A look at reusable AI assets from SAP
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP has a rich and diverse reusable AI Assets portfolio. Reusable AI Assets include various AI Business Services and one digital assistance. AI Business Service covers various recommendation services it offers, extraction services and classification services. One digital assistance provides a unified digital assistance experience to its end users. The session here gives an overview of these offerings.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Concept of Value Chain Analysis with use case: CO2e Calculation
sessionsByTrack.description: The session would focus on innovations around Component Breakdown as part of Universal Parallel Accounting, which helps to provide various vectors such as Product Cost and Quantity Breakdown with one use case example

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Get the latest outlook of SAP Cloud ALM for Implementation
sessionsByTrack.description: Get the latest outlook of SAP Cloud ALM for Implementation

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Concur Product Strategy and Roadmap
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP Concur roadmap will be explained in depth along with giving an overview on the look forward and strategy defined for Concur Solutions and Feature capabilities

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Global Search
sessionsByTrack.description: Powerful enterprise elastic search in SAP Sales Cloud and SAP Service Cloud. Global Search is built on the concept of elastic search to take advantage of its speed. It has been built to achieve flexibility and ease of use considering usability and is enabled by default in service cloud version 2 solution

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Discovering Open-Source ABAP
sessionsByTrack.description: Get an overview of rapid rise of Open-source applications in ABAP and learn how SAP customers can be benefitted by leveraging them in their projects and products.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP BTP Governance, Cloud Identity Services, and Best Practices
sessionsByTrack.description: Agenda includes, BTP Overview, Governance, Account Models, Security options, etc
sessionsByTrack.tracktitle: SAP BTP General and Cross Topics

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle:
ABAP for S4HANA Cloud &
Extensibility using SAP Extensibility Explorer
sessionsByTrack.description: Overview of the ABAP offering for Cloud and Exploration of Extensibility options possible in S4HANA Cloud using SAP Extensibility Explorer

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Overview of SAP Datasphere - Capabilities and Model Data Journey
sessionsByTrack.description:
With a unified experience for data integration, data cataloging, semantic modeling, data warehousing, data federation, and data virtualization, SAP Datasphere enables data professionals to easily distribute mission-critical business data—with business context and logic preserved—across their organization’s data landscape.

The session will provide an overview of the importance of SAP Datasphere and how to get started. We will look at the steps that the customers need to take - Operate, Integrate, Manage, and Use - to have a successful data journey with SAP Datasphere.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: ICMR in Group Reporting
sessionsByTrack.description: Intercompany matching and reconciliation in Group Reporting

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Digitizing Sourcing & Procurement in Rise with SAP
sessionsByTrack.description: The topic gives an overview of how customers are innovating faster and transforming businesses with RISE with SAP on AWS. How the unique architecture of SAP on AWS helps maximize performance and protect you from disruptions

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Elevating From Paper Trails to Digital Highways
sessionsByTrack.description: A Half-Decade of Digital Transformation in Travel & Expenses with SAP Concur.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Design Harmonisation
sessionsByTrack.description: How the team sifted through over 100 apps to define consistency parameters for our apps and why it matters.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Fuelling Business Innovation Through SAP BTP & Hyperscalers Joint Reference Architectures
sessionsByTrack.description: This session will be about SAP BTP’s ‘Joint Reference Architecture’ with Cloud Service providers like Google Cloud Platform. We will be talking about different ways in which these architectures help reduce TCO, support automation or enable use of AI/ML in Business Scenarios. Helping to understand how organisations can get most out of their investments in SAP BTP and Cloud Service Providers

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Storyboard in CAP: The Low-Code Application Development Way
sessionsByTrack.description:
The Storyboard is a detailed graphical view for CAP applications that presents their logical components and the connections between them available in SAP Business Application Studio.
Join us for an engaging session that delves into the world of low-code application development using the power of CAP (Cloud Application Programming Model) within SAP Business Application Studio.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Using SAC Capabilities for day to day Finance Operations
sessionsByTrack.description: This session will provide an insight on practical use of SAC within Mercedes-Benz for addressing day to day Finance related topics. It will also focus on how SAC helps end users to save time from repetitive tasks to focus on quality analysis.
sessionsByTrack.organization: Mercedes Benz Research & Development India Pvt Ltd

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Rise with SAP Offering highlights
sessionsByTrack.description: RISE with SAP can transition your current ERP data and processes to the cloud with less risk and without compromise. The bundle of tailor-made ERP software, transformation services, business analytics, and partner expertise guides you along a personalized path to the cloud.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Optimizing Supply Chain in S/4HANA with Material Requirement Planning
sessionsByTrack.description: This will give an understanding of Supply chain optimizations  and how to achieve a minimal disruption and resilience of the business by using SAP S/4HANA MRP features. You will also learn how the AI and ML are contributing to supply chain optimization's in SAP S/4HANA.
sessionsByTrack.organization: Walmart Global tech India Pvt Ltd

sessionsByTrack.speakers: Sidharth Jain, Chunmun Gupta, Shiva Kumar H S, Trisha Sinha
sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Reimagining payments
sessionsByTrack.description:
The next-generation payment solutions with Concur is seamless, allowing customers to effortlessly harness the benefits of this innovation. This innovative enterprise payment solution aims to provide customers with significant cost savings and enhanced controls. 
Razorpay is a payment gateway that can add value to SAP Concur by offering a variety of payment methods, real-time payments, fraud protection, API integration, and customer support. These features can help businesses to process payments, improve their cash flow, protect themselves from fraud, and automate the payment process.
sessionsByTrack.organization: Razorpay Software Private Limited, SAP Labs

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Flexible Programming Model Makes SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 even easier to use
sessionsByTrack.description: While most apps at SAP fall into a few general categories, we have recently introduced the flexible programming model to allow applications that don't look like one of our standard SAP Fiori elements floorplans. The flexible programming model makes it easier to create or extend apps based on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4. In this session, we’ll show some of the new capabilities of this approach and how it will help you reduce development and maintenance time on the apps you create.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Empower Yourself, Empower Women In Tech!
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP Women in Tech is delighted to share that this session will help you to know the importance of empowering yourself along with empowering women in tech. Let’s talk about how to build a supportive network, celebrate your achievements, mindful working and how to ignore the moments of self-doubt. Join our session and let’s discuss on various aspects of empowering yourself.

sessionsByTrack.speakers: Kedar Ketkar, Surekha Chawale, Reshma Pawar
sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP BTP Adoption for Public Cloud
sessionsByTrack.description: It is an art of possibilities to enrich SAP application on public cloud with better user experience, flexibility to adapt to business changes and better decision making with Analytics & AI.
sessionsByTrack.tracktitle: SAP BTP General and Cross Topics

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Enterprise Automation with SAP (SAP Build+SAP Integration Suite+SAP Signavio)
sessionsByTrack.description:
Accelerating Time to Business Impact

Learn how SAP enterprise automation can help you automate business and IT processes faster.

The more you automate, the greater the impact. In this session, you can understand and act, automate completely, and accelerate impact. You’ll see: 
	• Why traditional automation and RPA are only a part of the solution
	• How AI, process mining and analytics, and integration are critical
	• How SAP customers are creating value with enterprise automation 
See a  demo of enterprise automation in action

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP BW bridge capabilities of SAP Datasphere
sessionsByTrack.description: A concept of providing SAP BW functionality in public cloud and to access SAP BW data model in SAP Datasphere.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Leveraging SAP Signavio business process modeling with SAP EWM​
sessionsByTrack.description: How Signavio business process modeling can be used with SAP EWM e.g. BPMN 2.0, Value chain diagrams, PFDs etc.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Intelligent Mobile Sales – SAP Sales Cloud v2
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP Sales Cloud Mobile App increases sales efficiency with intuitive, mobile friendly sales capabilities that prepare and empower connected selling. It helps streamline selling from anywhere with a purpose-built native application designed for intelligent and fast sales interactions. It allows to engage customers on the go with prescriptive recommendations, guided actions, and intelligent insights. And it provides quick access to activity and transactional data via native widgets.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Seamless Concur Rollout: Empowering 45K Minds
sessionsByTrack.description: Streamlined Integration and rollout experience of Onboarding 45,000 Mindtree Employees onto Concur system after LTI Merger

sessionsByTrack.speakers: Rai Kamal Saha, Abhijeet Singh Panwar
sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Unleashing Digital Workplace Experiences
sessionsByTrack.description:
Too many apps with too many notifications can get distracting and overwhelming.

SAP Build Work Zone is one solution, facilitating the rapid creation of engaging and personalized business sites.

It is available in two different editions - SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition (previously SAP Launchpad service)
and SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition (previously SAP Work Zone service). 

Join this session to learn how SAP Build Zone is used as a single access point to applications, processes, and tasks .

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Would you like to become an Integration black belter?
sessionsByTrack.description:
Integration Black Belt is an enabler program from SAP to become a subject matter expert in SAP’s integration technology and strategy. Learn about the various capabilities of SAP’s integration platform and learn best practices to effectively support your integration journey. It’s a technology knowledge program by SAP enterprise support value maps. 

Session Covers:
•	Overview On API-based Integration Architecture
•	Understand Integration Between SAP Lob Applications and SAP’s Integration Strategy
•	Understand Key Capabilities Of The SAP Integration Suite
•	Understand The Current Integration Challenge for Enterprise Architects

How we leverage our experience to address the key customer requirements considering all aspects of T&E Process, lessons learnt and the value leavers to unlock the potential business value for clients, with presence in multiple counties across the globe.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Overview of SAP Event Driven Architecture and SAP Event Mesh
sessionsByTrack.description: The session will include an overview of event driven architecture - it’s basic concept and benefits , get familiarized with SAP BTP service - Event Mesh and its components .We will also go through a use case that leverages event mesh and understand the end-to-end flow.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP AI Business Document Processing Service Overview
sessionsByTrack.description: Business document extraction is part of various lines of business use cases. Business gets printed documents for their business process. But it involves a huge manual intervention to trigger the business process.  This has been solved using business document extraction. However, the current document extraction supports a pre-defined structure. It does not solve the entire problem. This has been solved using supporting schema and templates in the document extraction workflow. The end users get the flexibility of defining their own headers and line items specific to their document. This can be achieved using defining their schemas. Or they can also their end users’ scenarios. They may have their HR-specific documents with different headers or finance documents in the different headers or line items. They can define various schemas for these use cases. There can also be situations that document structures are different for their different vendors. This can be defined using their templates.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Managing & determining Responsibilities easily & centrally using S/4HANA Responsibility Management
sessionsByTrack.description: S/4HANA Responsibility Management helps today’s Intelligent Enterprises manage their Business Users’ responsibilities uniformly & centrally. It also helps determine the right agents/recipients to be notified for work items / events / situations occurring in their business processes. Customizing & extensibility has been provided out of the box in Responsibility Management.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: DevOps with SAP BTP
sessionsByTrack.description:
The session will include overview of SAP BTP DevOps portfolio, understanding different BTP services and frameworks around DevOps. Participants will also learn how an end-to-end DevOps in SAP BTP works. 
This session will be a great opportunity to get yourself up to speed and ready to embark your DevOps journey with SAP BTP.
sessionsByTrack.tracktitle: SAP BTP General and Cross Topics

sessionsByTrack.speakers: Mrutyunjay Padmasali Sidda, Naga Durga Krishna Mohan Eaty
sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Migration tool in Cloud Integration Capability to migrate integration artifacts from SAP Process Orchestration to SAP Integration Suite
sessionsByTrack.description: Migration Tooling is a feature in the Cloud Integration capability of the SAP Integration Suite that enables you to semi-automate the migrations of integration scenarios from SAP Process Orchestration (PO) to SAP Integration Suite. In the session, we will explain the high-level architecture of the migration tool. In addition to this, we will show case end to end demo which will cover how to leverage migration assessment capability of SAP Integration suite to assess whether the scenario is migratable or not and how much effort is required for the migration. We will also cover the usage of the migration tool feature of Cloud integration capability which will essentially migrate the PO artifacts in a semi-automatic way which will drastically reduce the effort required for the migration.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP AI core and AI Launchpad Overview Session
sessionsByTrack.description: SAP AI core and AI Launchpad Overview Session

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Intelligent Spend Management with SAP BTP and Ariba Business Network
sessionsByTrack.description: This session gives an overview and understand on how SAP BTP can be effectively applied within spend management solutions, equipped with insights into various BTP extension types, integration possibilities and the real-time analytics potential that SAP BTP offers, all contributing to improved efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and informed decision-making in the realm of spend management solutions - Ariba

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Cybersecurity best practices for S4 HANA and BTP
sessionsByTrack.description: The topic explains about best cyber practices one should follow while implementing and using SAP products (especially SAP S4, BTP and other cloud solutions). These practices might be evident and easy to implement with other java based or cloud systems with SAP ABAP systems, but it comes with its challenges due to the proprietorship of SAP products / their codes. The topic will explain some key aspects of those security checks, specifically in terms of SAP systems

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Intergate ML in your SAP Applications using ABAP ML SDK for Google Cloud
sessionsByTrack.description: In this session i will talk about the newly launched ABAP ML SDK for Google Cloud and its capabilities, and how ABAP developers can Intergate ML capabilities with existing SAP applications.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Create Mobile Apps with a few clicks - Leveraging SAP Build
sessionsByTrack.description: With the constraint of time in today's fast paced world, it has become important to create quick applications for client approvals. Recently our team created a mobile app within 2 weeks from design to distribute with backend integration. The EY ERA app built using SAP Build is already available on Google play and Apple app store.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: SAP Master Data Integration for the Intelligent Enterprise
sessionsByTrack.description: We will explore the key concepts of master data integration and its role as a fundamental building block in achieving an Intelligent Enterprise. We will discuss the challenges organizations encounter when handling diverse and dispersed data sources and how SAP's integrated solutions offer seamless data harmonization.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: All new extended Situation Handling in S/4HANA
sessionsByTrack.description: The new age Situation handling framework comes with an extended framework of Situation Handling concepts and supports customers in creating custom situations. In this session let us see an end-to-end demo of how customers can create the entire Situation scenario from the start.

sessionsByTrack.description: This was one of the first public cloud implementation with all core module.Can share the Experience

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Principles of user centered design in SAP Concur
sessionsByTrack.description: From simplifying workflows to enhancing accessibility, learn how SAP Concur's UX innovations are driving efficiency, satisfaction, and productivity for both end-users and businesses.

sessionsByTrack.sessiontitle: Cyclic Action Research: Experiences and Best Practices from Oil and Gas Field Logistics
sessionsByTrack.description: For Upstream Field Logistics in the Oil and Gas area, in collaboration with our consortium of customers including Shell, BP, Inpex, ConocoPhillips and Chevron, we conducted remote research at each stage of the design process. This includes requirements gathering, conceptual walkthroughs, usability testing and follow-up post implementation remote Usability Testing. The process matches the 5 stages of Action Research Cycle: diagnosing, action planning, action taking, evaluating and specifying learning.
